title: does riot even ban in oce anymore
body: just wondering if riot oce actually bans anymore, i've recieved 1 message in the last year from my reports saying that action was taken, since then so many reports and not 1 message, you know this is the reason that overwatch is going to shut league down, no1 can be stuffed playing when u deal with shit every 2nd game, or are riot too busy focusing on the lcs and worlds and skins to give a shit about actually doing something to do with their ingame community........ RIP league of legends 2010-2016

replies.body:
Toxic players are banned in Oceania, just like they're banned in North America, Europe West, and Europe Nordic & East (and the other servers). You may not be receiving report feedback because you weren't in the last group of reporters who triggered a punishment, but your report does help the system identify acceptable and unacceptable behaviour, and subsequently punish those who are negative. In the past few months, I've had my number of report feedback messages because I consistently use the report feature when I see negative/toxic behaviour, and only report when there's good cause/reason. 

Here's a good article on how your reports help shape the Player Behaviour systems for League of Legends:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/reports-how-do-they-work

Let me know if you have any questions!

*Last player.

Though it's actually the last game in which they were reported that gets the notification, so if multiple people in that game report someone and it triggers a punishment, all of those people will get a notification.
